name: Tangie
description: Tangie is another fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam that has quickly gained popularity in its home and is spreading elsewhere. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of Tangerine Dream that was sought-after in the 1990s. The genetics on this strain are a cross of California Orange and a Skunk hybrid, and its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma. As a plant, Tangie grows best outside, producing sticky buds that provide euphoric yet relaxed effects.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Relaxed, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Paranoid
